text: Barbara "Bobbi" Morse is a fictional superheroine in the Marvel Comics universe. The character was created by Neal Adams, and Len Wein, and first appeared in Astonishing Tales #6 in June of 1971. == Fictional character biography == She was a special S.H.I.E.L.D. black-ops agent who first became Agent 19 for the team, then she took the moniker Huntress in Marvel Super Action #1 in 1976, and Mockingbird in Marvel Team-Up #95 in 1980. Finally, she became a member of the Avengers' splinter teams, and was the partner of Hawkeye. == In other media == Mockingbird has been described as one of Marvel's most notable female heroes. In media set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), Bobbi Morse appeared in the second and third seasons of the television series Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (2013â€“2020), portrayed by Adrianne Palicki, while the role of Agent 19 of S.H.I.E.L.D. is adapted to Laura Barton, portrayed by Linda Cardellini in the 2015 movie Avengers: Age of Ultron and the Disney+ series Hawkeye (2021). Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Mockingbird (Marvel Comics)
